halfsiphash.cc

15/*
16 * Originally taken from https://github.com/veorq/SipHash/
17 * Altered to match V8's use case.
18 */
19
20#include "src/third_party/siphash/halfsiphash.h"
21
22#include "src/base/logging.h"
23
24#define ROTL(x, b) (uint32_t)(((x) << (b)) | ((x) >> (32 - (b))))
25
26#define SIPROUND \
27 do { \
28 v0 += v1; \
29 v1 = ROTL(v1, 5); \
30 v1 ^= v0; \
31 v0 = ROTL(v0, 16); \
32 v2 += v3; \
33 v3 = ROTL(v3, 8); \
34 v3 ^= v2; \
35 v0 += v3; \
36 v3 = ROTL(v3, 7); \
37 v3 ^= v0; \
38 v2 += v1; \
39 v1 = ROTL(v1, 13); \
40 v1 ^= v2; \
41 v2 = ROTL(v2, 16); \
42 } while (0)
43
44// Simplified half-siphash-2-4 implementation for 4 byte input.
45uint32_t halfsiphash(const uint32_t value, const uint64_t seed) {
46 uint32_t v0 = 0;
47 uint32_t v1 = 0;
48 uint32_t v2 = 0x6c796765;
49 uint32_t v3 = 0x74656462;
50 uint32_t k[2];
51 memcpy(k, &seed, sizeof(seed));
52 uint32_t b = 4 << 24;
53 v3 ^= k[1];
54 v2 ^= k[0];
55 v1 ^= k[1];
56 v0 ^= k[0];
57
58 v3 ^= value;
59
60 // 2 c-rounds
61 SIPROUND;
62 SIPROUND;
63
64 v0 ^= value;
65 v3 ^= b;
66
67 // 2 c-rounds
68 SIPROUND;
69 SIPROUND;
70
71 v0 ^= b;
72 v2 ^= 0xff;
73
74 // 4 d-rounds
75 SIPROUND;
76 SIPROUND;
77 SIPROUND;
78 SIPROUND;
79
80 b = v1 ^ v3;
81 return b;
82}
uint32_t
